titleStmt.title: A curious collection of paintings, of several rare masters, will be sold by auction, at the Middle Exchange; otherwise called Salisbury Change, in the Strand, on Monday the 26th. of this instant May, at three of the clock in the afternoon The conditions of sale as usual, and the time of paying and fetching away the lots so bought, to be within three days after at the said place, and paying portridge.

A curious collection of paintings, of several rare masters, will be sold by auction, at the Middle Exchange; otherwise called Salisbury Change, in the Strand, on Monday the 26th. of this instant May, at three of the clock in the afternoon The conditions of sale as usual, and the time of paying and fetching away the lots so bought, to be within three days after at the said place, and paying portridge.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
